content: whether in acrylic or cotton this crochet baby bonnet is the perfect gift for the little one in your life featured in bernat softee baby or bernat softee baby cotton you ll learn chain double_crochet working in rounds working in row shaping and more this pattern is written for beginners but experienced crafters will enjoy the simplicity of this classic heirloom piece materials sizes 6/12 18/24 mos version 1 bernat® softee baby™ 5 oz/140 g 362 yds/331 m prettiest pink 30205 or little mouse 30010 1 ball note 1 ball makes approx 5 4 bonnets version 2 bernat® softee baby cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m feather gray 62010 or cotton 62009 1 ball note 1 ball makes approx 4 3 bonnets sizes to fit baby 6/12 18/24 months gauges 16 double_crochet and 8 row = 4 10 cm 16 single_crochet and 19 row = 4 10 cm
